Reviews.Title: “Not for you if you value your privacy!!”
Reviews.Author: Kym D
Reviews.Content: stayed ambassador 1 night shower staff themselves locked shower cubicle apparently fix blocked drain walked highly entertaining walking continued knock door incessantly talked staff implied left door unlocked didnt heard staff playing handle minutes actually am confident inside doubt spoke maintenance people afterwards wouldnt feel confident wouldnt happen else shower ambassador vancouver own risk

Reviews.Title: “Threw me out on the street! Not for my actions, but anothers'”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer C
Reviews.Content: staying 10 days extend stay week wouldnt manager left note told ahead time socalled friend mine dropped night name guess sort discussion story short totally left scrambling stuff stay minute accept blame friend commen sense bite tongue feels giving hard time actions paid consequences fair yeah thats life maid virtually nonexistant free wifi crapped hotel maybe punishment whatever stupidity happened wasnt sound whiney hate mild panic nice single girl own street nice

Reviews.Title: “change of name”
Reviews.Author: jeannie020
Reviews.Content: hotel changed name ambassador hotel exactly backpackers hotel price comfortable terribly hot sleep window door partly secured ac staff friendly clean handy centre town granville market

Reviews.Title: “Centrally located, and great value for a budget traveler.”
Reviews.Author: deadhippy
Reviews.Content: vancouver 4 days stayed cosy unwind day sightseeing shared bathrooms clean nice cozy lounge watch tv enjoy wifi friendly staff walking distance granville island museum shopping districts train stations etc easy airport
